title: Low Intermediate Bahasa Indonesian for Professional Proficiency
description: This course is designed to enable students with low to intermediate knowledge and skills of Bahasa Indonesia to further develop communicative skills through a combination of classes, exercises, and other language experiences. Renumbered from IRLA 461A-B-C. Students may not get credit for any IRLA 461 course and the GPLA course of the same number and quarter designation.
